title: Brown Silk Embroidered Draped Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a brown silk draped flowing dress with full sleeves and crew neck, delicate tonal embroidery across bodice and hem, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims

provenance.inspiration: Organic drape inspired by flowing river currents and artisanal embroidery traditions
